setup.name: auth_endpoint
setup.label: Zoho Auth Region
setup.message: Enter Zoho Auth Region https://accounts.zoho.in, https://accounts.zoho.com

setup.name: client_id
setup.label: OAuth2.0 Client ID
setup.placeholder: Enter Zoho Commerce's OAuth2.0 Client ID

setup.name: client_secret
setup.label: OAuth2.0 Client Secret
setup.placeholder: Enter Zoho Commerce's OAuth2.0 Client Secret

setup.name: selected_scopes
setup.label: Scopes
setup.message: Add comma seperated scopes for accessing Zoho Commerce's api endpoints

user_info.text: User_info contains the edited profile details of the user

current_password.text: Current password of the user's account

new_password.text: New password that needs to be updated

confirm_password.text: Confirmation password of the newly entered password

address_details.text: Contains JSON of user address detail that needed to be updated

address_id.text: Address ID in the mapped shipping address detail of the user

product_variant_id.text: The item to be added in cart.

quantity.text: Quantity of the item to be added in cart.

cart_id.text: The identifier of the cart. It is created by default, if there is no cart ID.

custom_fields.text: Contains the custom field values for the product.

custom_field_id.text: Unique identifier of the custom field.

label.text: The label value of the custom field.

data_type.text: The data type of the custom field.

value.text: The value of the custom field.

The item to be updated in cart

quantity.text: Quantity of the item to be updated in cart

url.text: URL of the category. The value should be unique [URL can contain only letters (upper and lower cases), numbers, hyphen(-) and underscore(_)]

visibility.text: Visibility of the category in published site

show_in_menu.text: Specify whether the category should be shown as a menu item in published site or not

seo_keyword.text: Keywords related to category that can be used for SEO (Multiple keywords can be specified by separating them with commas)

seo_title.text: Title of the category to be used in SEO

seo_description.text: Description about the category to be used in SEO

parent_category_id.text: Parent ID of the category (Empty will be considered as ROOT)

category_id.text: Category id for which category detail is required

url.text: URL of the category. The value should be unique [URL can contain only letters (upper and lower cases), numbers, hyphen(-), and underscore(_)]

visibility.text: Visibility of the category in published site

show_in_menu.text: Specify whether the category should be shown as a menu item in published site or not

seo_keyword.text: Keywords related to category that can be used for SEO (Multiple keywords can be specified by separating them with commas)

seo_title.text: Title of the category to be used in SEO

seo_description.text: Description about the category to be used in SEO

parent_category_id.text: Parent ID of the category (Empty will be considered as ROOT)

delete_sub_categories.text: The value should be true when you're deleting the parent category. If the category has no child the param can be neglected

categories.text: Array of category IDs in their respective sibling order

name.text: Name of the category's image (shouldn't contain any html characters like <>)

alter_text.text: Alternate text for the category's image (shouldn't contain any html characters like <>)

checkout_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the checkout. This is used as an identifier
Unique ID generated by the server for the checkout. This is used as an identifier

shipping_address.text: The address to which the goods must be delivered

first_name.text: First name of the customer's shipping/billing

last_name.text: Last name of the customer's shipping/billing

email_address.text: Email Id of the customer's shipping/billing address

state.text: State of the customer's shipping/billing address

postal_code.text: ZIP Code of the customer's shipping/billing address

telephone.text: Phone number of the customer's shipping/billing address

country.text: Country of the customer's shipping/billing address

same_billing_address.text: Checks whether the billing address is the same as shipping address

billing_address.text: Billing address of the customer (contains the same fields as above)

checkout_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the checkout. This is used as an identifier

shipping.text: The id of the shipping method to be added for the checkout

Unique ID generated by the server for the checkout. This is used as identifier

coupon_code.text: The coupon code to be applied. To remove the coupon you need to change the data type to empty string

activation_time.text: If true, guest users cannot apply this coupon

minimum_order_value.text: Order total must be greater than this amount in order to apply this coupon

eligible_products.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned products

eligible_shipping_zones.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned shipping zones

eligible_customers.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned customers

restrict_for_guest_user.text: If true, guest user cannot apply this coupon

minimum_order_value.text: Order total must be greater than this amount in order to apply this coupon

eligible_products.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned products

eligible_shipping_zones.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned shipping zones

eligible_customers.text: Coupon applicable for the mentioned customers

importfile.text: Give file that needs to be imported

entity.text: Give entity type of the import. Only possible value is 'itemgroup'

duplicate_handling.text: Give value that defines how to handle duplicate records. Only possible value is 'overwrite'

charencoding.text: Give character encoding used in the file. Possible values are UTF-8, UTF-16

delimiter.text: Give delimiter used in the file. Possible values are ',' and ';'

entity_columns.text: Give array of all entity and csv column mapping (Use entity_columns array response format from the step 1)

entity_column.text: Give corresponding entity column name for mapping

line_items.text: Give a list of all the items along with adjustment quantity

item_id.text: Give variant_id of the product that needs to be adjusted

quantity_adjusted.text: The adjusted quantity of the line item

product_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the product. This is used as identifier
Unique ID generated by the server for the product. This is used as identifier

category_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the category. This is used as identifier
Unique ID generated by the server for the category. This is used as identifier

collection_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the collection. This is used as identifier
Unique ID generated by the server for the collection. This is used as identifier

q.text: The query string to be searched for in the store

filterDate.text: Represents the number of months for which the orders need to be displayed

line_items.text: List of line items to be returned

payment_mode.text: Mode through which payment is made. This can be check, cash, credit card, bank transfer, bank remittance, auto transaction, or others. Maximum length = 100

amount.text: Amount paid in the respective payment

reference_number.text: Reference number generated for the payment. A string of your choice can also be used as the reference number. Maximum length of the reference number = 100

date.text: Date on which payment is made. Date Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

payment_mode.text: Mode through which payment is made. This can be check, cash, credit card, bank transfer, bank remittance, auto transaction, or others. Maximum length = 100

amount.text: Amount paid in the respective payment

reference_number.text: Reference number generated for the payment. A string of your choice can also be used as the reference number. Maximum length of the reference number = 100

date.text: Date on which payment is made. Date Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

filter_by.text: Allowed Values : Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Inactive, ItemType.All, ItemType.Inventory, ItemType.NonInventory

sort_column.text: Allowed Values : name, created_time, last_modified_time, min_rate, max_rate

show_in_storefront.text: When enabled, this shows the product in store

attribute_name1.text: Give attribute name for the product

attribute_name2.text: Give attribute name for the product

attribute_name3.text: Give attribute name for the product

attribute_type1.text: Two possible values are Text (default value) or Color

attribute_type2.text: Two possible values are Text (default value) or Color

attribute_type3.text: Two possible values are Text (default value) or Color

category_id.text: Give the unique category_id to map the category

tags.text: Give the list of tags for the product

brand.text: Give the brand name for the product

is_returnable.text: Enable this if product can be returned by the customers

is_featured.text: Enable this if product is on sale

seo_keyword.text: Give SEO keywords for the product

seo_description.text: Give SEO description for the product

specificationset_id.text: Give unique specification set ID to give specification details for the product

specifications.text: Give set of specification_id and specification_value_id

specification_id.text: Give unique specification id that denotes the label

specification_value_id.text: Denotes the value for the particular label

variants.text: Give list of all the variants for the product

rate.text: Give selling price of the variant

initial_stock.text: This field is MANDATORY if you pass variant_type as 'inventory'

attribute_option_name1.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For Eg: If attribute_name1 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name1 (eg: large,medium,..etc) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_name2.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For Eg: If attribute_name1 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name1 (eg: large,medium,..etc) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_name3.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For Eg: If attribute_name1 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name1 (eg: large,medium,..etc) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_data1.text: Give color code for the correspoding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as colour.For Eg: If attribute_type2 is Colour then give corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data2

attribute_option_data2.text: Give color code for the correspoding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as colour.For Eg: If attribute_type2 is Colour then give corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data2

attribute_option_data3.text: Give color code for the correspoding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as colour.For Eg: If attribute_type2 is Colour then give corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data2

label_rate.text: Give retail price of the variant

custom_fields.text: Give set of customfield_id and value for the variant

customfield_id.text: Give unique cusomfield id to denote the label

value.text: Give corresponding values for the label

reorder_level.text: Low stock limit for the variant below which will trigger an email remainder

package_details.text: Give package details such as weight, width, height and length. This is used to calcuate shipping charges at the time of checkout

hsn_or_sac.text: Give HSN or SAC for the variant. For India Only

avatax_tax_code.text: Give Avalara tax code for the variant. For US Only

product_id.text: Give unique product id to get the details

variant_type.text: Give variant_type as 'inventory' to track inventory stock for the product

show_in_storefront.text: When enabled, this shows the product in store

attribute_name1.text: Give attribute name for the product. You can add a maximum of 3 attributes

attribute_name2.text: Give attribute name for the product. You can add a maximum of 3 attributes

attribute_name3.text: Give attribute name for the product. You can add a maximum of 3 attributes

attribute_type1.text: Give attribute type corresponding to the attribute name given. Two possible values are Text (default value) or Colour

attribute_type2.text: Give attribute type corresponding to the attribute name given. Two possible values are Text (default value) or Colour

attribute_type3.text: Give attribute type corresponding to the attribute name given. Two possible values are Text (default value) or Colour

category_id.text: Give the unique category_id to map the category

tags.text: Give the list of tags for the product

brand.text: Give the brand name for the product

is_returnable.text: Enable this if the product can be returned by the customers

is_featured.text: Enable this if the product is on sale

seo_keyword.text: Give SEO keywords for the product

seo_description.text: Give SEO description for the product

specificationset_id.text: Give a unique specification set ID to give specification details for the product

specifications.text: Give a set of specification_id and specification_value_id

specification_id.text: Give a unique specification id that denotes the label

specification_value_id.text: Give a unique specification value id that denotes the value for the particular label

page_layout_id.text: Give a unique page layout id corresponding to custom field details pertaining to a specific product

variants.text: Give a list of all the variants for the product

rate.text: Give the selling price of the variant

initial_stock.text: Give the stock count for the variant. This field is MANDATORY if you pass variant_type as 'inventory'

attribute_option_name1.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For example, if attribute_name1 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name1 (e.g., large, medium, etc.) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_name2.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For example, if attribute_name2 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name2 (e.g., large, medium, etc.) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_name3.text: Give attribute values for the corresponding attributes. For example, if attribute_name3 is SIZE then give attribute_option_name3 (e.g., large, medium, etc.) with the corresponding values

attribute_option_data1.text: Give color code for the corresponding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as Colour. For example, if attribute_type2 is Colour then give the corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data2

attribute_option_data2.text: Give color code for the corresponding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as Colour. For example, if attribute_type2 is Colour then give the corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data2

attribute_option_data3.text: Give color code for the corresponding attributes. This field is only needed when you give attribute_type as Colour. For example, if attribute_type3 is Colour then give the corresponding color code value in attribute_option_data3

label_rate.text: Give the retail price of the variant

document_ids.text: Give a set of document_id of the images to map with variants

custom_fields.text: Give a set of custom_field values for the variant

customfield_id.text: Give a unique custom field id to denote the label

value.text: Give corresponding values for the label

reorder_level.text: Low stock limit for the variant below which will trigger an email reminder

package_details.text: Give package details such as weight, width, height, and length. This is used to calculate shipping charges at the time of checkout

hsn_or_sac.text: Give HSN or SAC for the variant. For India only

avatax_tax_code.text: Give Avalara tax code for the variant. For US only

product_ids.text: Give list of product_ids with comma separated

is_deletedInfoNeeded.text: To get the detail of the product

documents.text: Give set of document_id and order to reorder the images

document_id.text: Give document_id of the image obtained from product data

order.text: Give the order number of the particular image

entity.text: Give entity type of the export. Only possible value is 'itemgroup'

accept.text: Give format for the export file. Possible values are csv/xls

from_date.text: Give from date for the export. Format: yyyy-mm-dd

to_date.text: Give to_date for the export. Format: yyyy-mm-dd

export_limit.text: Give export limit. Should be less than 25,000

export_start_id.text: Entity that have IDs greater to this start id will be fetched with limit

export_start_index.text: Offset row number: this will start exporting from nth row of export entity

filter_by.text: Status filter. Options: All, Draft, Confirmed, ToBePacked, ToBeShipped, Shipped, ToBeInvoiced, Closed, Void

sort_column.text: Column to sort by. Options: customer_name, salesorder_number, date, shipment_date, total, bcy_total, created_time, last_modified_time

page.text: Page number. Should be a positive integer

show_comment_to_client.text: Boolean to determine whether the comment needs to be shown to client

mail_to_customer.text: Boolean to determine whether it has to be mailed to the customer

transaction_type.text: Allowed values: salesorder, customer_payment, shipment_order, contact, none

attention.text: Name of the person, whose attention is required

address.text: Name of the street of the customer's billing address

city.text: Name of the city of the customer's billing address

state.text: Name of the state of the customer's billing address

zip.text: ZIP code of the customer's billing address

country.text: Name of the country of the customer's billing address

fax.text: Fax number of the customer's billing address

salesorder_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the sales order. This is used as identifier.

line_items.text: List of items in a package. Each line item contains salesorder_item_id, item_id, and quantity

salesorder_item_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for each line item. This is used as an identifier

quantity.text: Quantity of the item to be returned

salesreturn_id.text: Unique ID generated by the server for the sales return. This is used as identifier

salesreturn_status.text: The current status of the sales return

shipped_status.text: The current status of the package

refund_status.text: The current status of the refund
